title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends Lex Corp. Hauler
features: Kryptonite cage locks into the Lex Corp. Hauler for transport
Turn Power Pad to eject cage
Press button to fire Kryptonite blaster
Lock Kryptonite blaster to Lex Corp. Hauler truck or remove it to use against Superman
Includes Lex Corp. Hauler vehicle, Lex Luthor figure with removable armor, bonus Superman figure, removable Kryptonite blaster, Kryptonite grabber, removable Kryptonite cage and 2 projectiles
description: The evil Lex Luthor knows the one weakness of Superman. So he built the Lex Corp. Hauler truck with a Kryptonite blaster to zap Superman's strength and a Kryptonite cage to trap the Man of Steel! Once he's captured, kids can lock the cage in the toy truck to transport him to Lex Luthor's hideout – and then turn the Power Pad to eject the cage when he's arrived. Is this truly the end of Superman Kids use their greatest power – imagination – to create exciting adventures for their favorite DC Super Friends characters with a variety of outcomes! Imaginext … Turn on Adventure!
